data.Description: Total useful life of PPE in months.

data.Name: Useful_Life_Remaining
data.DictionaryEntryName: ADC_ PPE Master. Useful Life Remaining. Numeric
data.Description: Remaining useful life of PPE in months as of the report date.
data.XBRLGL: Rather than remaining life in month, the ending date for depreciation is provided with gl-bus:dmEndDate

data.Name: Original_Cost
data.DictionaryEntryName: ADC_ PPE Master. Original_ Cost. Amount
data.Description: Original cost of PPE.
data.XBRLGL: Using gl-bus:measurableCostPerUnit in a parallel measurable structure with gl-bus:measurableQualifier = original_cost

data.Name: Residual_Value
data.DictionaryEntryName: ADC_ PPE Master. Residual Value. Amount
data.Description: Residual value of PPE as of the report date. This value is typically calculated by an expected residual value ratio.
data.XBRLGL: Using gl-bus:measurableCostPerUnit in a parallel measurable structure with gl-bus:measurableQualifie r = residual_value

data.Name: Accumulated_Depreciation
data.DictionaryEntryName: ADC_ PPE Master. Accountumulated Depreciation. Amount
data.Description: The accumulated depreciation of PPE as of the report date.
data.XBRLGL: Using gl-bus:measurableCostPer Unit in a parallel measurable structure with gl-bus:measurableQualifie r = depreciable_basis

data.Name: Impairment_Provision
data.DictionaryEntryName: ADC_ PPE Master. Impairment Provision. Amount
data.Description: The impairment provision of PPE as of the report date.
data.XBRLGL: Using gl-bus:measurableCostPerUnit in a parallel measurable structure with gl-bus:measurableQualifie r = impairment_provision

data.Name: Net_Book_Value
data.DictionaryEntryName: ADC_ PPE Master. Net Book Value. Amount
data.Description: Net book value of PPE as of the report date, which equals original cost minus accumulated depreciation and impairment provision.
data.XBRLGL: gl-cor:amount(As this is the value that ties to books, it is the primary amount. Other amounts are placed in parallel measurable structures.)

data.Name: Replacement_Cost
data.DictionaryEntryName: ADC_ PPE Master. Replacement_ Cost. Amount
data.Description: The replacement cost of PPE as of the report date.
data.XBRLGL: Using gl-bus:measurableCostPerUnit in a parallel measurable structure with gl-bus:measurableQualifier = replacement_cost

data.Name: Fair_Value

data.XBRLGL: Using gl-bus:measurableCostPerUnit in a parallel measurable structure with gl-bus:measurableQualifier = fair_value

data.Name: Fiscal_Year
data.DictionaryEntryName: ADC_ PPE Addition. Fiscal Year. ADC_ Accounting Period
data.Description: Accounting period in which the Addition_Date occurs. The year shall be shown in four digits as YYYY, which is part of the extended format and the YYYY-MM-DD in ISO 8601-1. Shall match the Fiscal_Year in the BAS_Accounting_Period table.

data.Name: Accounting_Period
data.DictionaryEntryName: ADC_ PPE Addition. Accounting Period. ADC_ Accounting Period
data.Description: Accounting period in which the Addition_Date occurs. EXAMPLE W1_W53 for weekly periods, M1_M12 for monthly periods, Q1_Q4 for quarterly periods, and from any beginning date to any ending date. Shall match the Accounting_Period in the BAS_Accounting_Period table.

data.Name: Tag_Number
data.DictionaryEntryName: ADC_ PPE Addition. Tag Number. Code
data.Description: The tag was commonly used when there was no ERP system to record PPE's state of the whole lifespan. Nowadays, some ERP systems still follow to use it in the business of PPE. The number is usually generated by manual input or is system generated; for example, when there is a PPE, a tag is created correspondingly. And each tag contains either one PPE or several PPEs. However, each PPE has its own PPE_ID as a unique identifier. If a tag only has one PPE, the PPE_ID is the same as the Tag_Number.

data.XBRLGL: gl-cor:documentTypeDescription with gl-cor:documentType of other unless a receipt or shipment, in which case gl-cor:documentType of receipt or shipment

data.Description: The GL account number on which Balance Sheet amount is recognized for accumulated depreciation. This number is generated either by manual input or by the system. Shall match the GL_Account_Number in the BAS_Chart_Of_Accounts table.

data.Name: Created_User_ID
data.DictionaryEntryName: ADC_ PPE Depreciation. Recorded. ADC_ Entry Operation
data.Description: The operation records on this record such as create, approve, last modify this record.
data.XBRLGL: Use corresponding element of XBRL GL taxonomy.

data.Name: Business_Segment_X
data.DictionaryEntryName: ADC_ PPE Depreciation. X. ADC_ Business Segment
data.Description: A reserved field that shall be used for business segments/structures. The 'X' signifies an organizational level. Each number used to replace the 'X' is associated with a unique reference level. For example, division, department, business unit, purchasing organization, project or legal entity.

data.DictionaryEntryName: ADC_ Created Activity. By. ADC_ User
data.Description: The unique identifier for the person who created the record.

data.DictionaryEntryName: ADC_ Created Activity. Date
data.Description: The date the transaction was created in the system. This should be a system generated date (rather than usercreated date), when possible. This is sometimes referred to as the creation date.

data.DictionaryEntryName: ADC_ Created Activity. Time
data.Description: The time this transaction record was created into the system.
data.XBRLGL: (This is included in the ISO 8601 representation of gl-cor:enteredDate, mentioned previously.)

data.DictionaryEntryName: ADC_ Local Tax. Tax Type. ADC_ Tax Type
data.Description: The code of Tax4 type. Shall match the Tax_Type_Code in the BAS_Tax_Type table.
data.XBRLGL: gl-cor:taxCode (Note that XBRL GL permits an unlimited number of tax codes and amounts with the gl-cor:taxes structure.)

data.DictionaryEntryName: ADC_ Local Tax. Tax. ADC_ Local Currency Amount
data.Description: The amount of Tax4 included in the transaction. Recorded in local currency.

data.DictionaryEntryName: ADC_ Local Tax. Tax Debit GL Account Number. ADC_ Chart Of Accounts
data.Description: The GL account number on which the debit side of the Tax4 transaction has been posted. Shall match the GL_Account_Number in the BAS_Chart_Of_Accounts table.
data.XBRLGL: XBRL GL does not have fields explicitly associating GL accounts to tax, although it does permit specification of accounts as tax accounts (gl-cor:accountPurposeCode); it associates tax detail in the gl-cor:taxes structure with specific accounts by including them within the same gl-cor:entryDetail if the gl-cor:amount is the same, or within the same gl-cor:entryHeader if amounts differ. As with the previous GL lines, the account numbers would be mapped to gl-cor:accountMainID.

data.DictionaryEntryName: ADC_ Local Tax. Tax Credit GL Account Number. ADC_ Chart Of Accounts
data.Description: The GL account number on which the credit side of the Tax4 transaction has been posted. Shall match the GL_Account_Number in the BAS_Chart_Of_Accounts table.

data.XBRLGL: XBRL GL does not have fields explicitly associating GL accounts to tax, although it does permit specification of accounts as tax accounts (gl-cor:accountPurposeCode); it associates tax detail in the gl-cor:taxes structure with specific accounts by including them within the same gl-cor:entryDetail if the gl-cor:amount is the same, or within the same gl-cor:entryHeader if amounts differ. As with the previous GL lines, the account numbers would be mapped to gl-cor:accountMainID.
